name: After All (itch) (Hai Dang)
description:
A world has only 3 colors: black, white and gray. Dimmily is a spirit dropped from the Black light.

Countless memories along the way, those of the day she died. At the end of the way, we will reach the church of the Final World where we will be taken to Heaven or Hell.

Which will Dimmily choose?

After all she will get where she wants, between Heaven and ... Hell.

-----

This is the first game I made, so the shortcomings are normal, I will learn from experience so that the next game will be more complete.

Sorry for English in the game and this download page, because it is completely translated by Google Translator.

Skip the problem, enjoy the game, Hai Dang <3.
